summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6723 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 54, Yesler's 2nd Addition (Supplemental), being the alley between 23rd Avenue East and 24th Avenue East from east John Street to East Thomas Street); by paving the same; by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary; providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance 109191, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing the interest limit on the Local Improvement Bonds.
